name: Tree story
description:
Use W A S D  to move 

Open the setting menu  on the top right side of house scene to toggle mobile controls 

Their are 4 places to go , one your house , second forest , third is car driving, forth is a secret 

Your can spend the wood to upgrade your house , or to update you axe damage 

If you crashes the car with the up sides barrels flood will come , spawning snakes everywhere 

If you want to exit car area you can come down with cars and click on the black symbols 

Spoilers 

(After flooding you can open next level at the car site down by clicking the arrows , clicking and draging the rocks to big rocks to rebuild the dam) don't look here spoilers
